resources.description: Pitch-by-pitch Statcast data for Japanese MLB pitchers (2015-2025). 119,106 rows, 119 columns.
Pitch-by-pitch Statcast data for Japanese MLB batters (2015-2025). 52,261 rows, 119 columns.
Player metadata for all 33 Japanese MLB players: MLBAM ID, name, role, team(s), NPB team, seasons, notes.
